title: Tow Truck Skarner
body: I have a new idea on how to get people back into playing Skarner. I call it 'Tow Truck Skarner' Pls write back Riot. I think I am onto something

replies.body: Cool idea but battlecast Skarner was too recent for them to release another. Can we get a Yorick skin please?

Plz rito
Im thinking Void Yorick KAPPA
Well haha, you guys get the point
